subject: pedal upgeade
description_text:
which upgrade kit will work with the pro plus or plus x pedals the pro x ultra upgrade kit or pro plus or plus x upgrade kit

Thank you

William guy vandiver III

conversations.body_text: Hi guyvandiver@centurylink. net,    You can purchase this link to upgrade to the Pro Plus pedal.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit
